title: WTB - HOF (or any) Uzit or BL460 (at the National?)
author: jggames

posts.post_title: WTB - HOF (or any) Uzit or BL460 (at the National?)
posts.post_content:
These are the 2 cards at the top of my list. I'd love to make a deal here or exchange in Chicago if anyone has one (or knows of one) that may be up for sale.

Thanks!
Jason

I struck out at the National for both of these. If anyone has one they'd part with, I have lots of cool stuff to trade and happy to pay cash!

Thanks!
